name: Mushroom pipe. Stone tobacco pipe. awesome rock mushrooms
description:
I am selling at etsy.com/shop/brooksfunctionalrock 
You can visit that site and write to me about what you would like. 
I will make what you are looking for at my art studio, and then send you photos of it to make sure it is what you want before I send it to you.
you can buy from this site, but I have found it is very easy to send photos and messages with etsy... either way thank you for looking at my product. I work very hard to carve out things that people will enjoy.

Spoons are the most common pipe people ask for. I personally enjoy spinning rock on a lathe. It is fun, dangerous, and makes a variety of shapes. Mushroom shaped pipes have sold very well for me. I can make a smaller mouth piece or a more blunt one. Please let me know what type you prefer and I will accommodate. The bowls are 5/8ths" wide and about 5/8ths" to 1" deep. the draw is 1/4" though some have a larger or smaller draw, the hole in the bottom of the bowl is 1/8th". I normally don't drill the draw all the way through for aesthetics. But I can also do a side carb or no carb if asked. also adding dots like the small yellow one can mask a carb as part of the pattern. Purple, red, white, and yellow are made of Pyrophillite. Black and translucent brown are Chlorite. I also have some soap stone in white and light green. As for exact color I can not control what the rock will look like. i will do what I can to get close to what you want. The striations and spots can be very different when I cut into the rock and may vary greatly even in the same color rock. Also some have more then one color like the center of the first photo has a yellow purple pipe. You may notice some of the other rocks are also translucent (Yellow is an awesome example). These are natural stone so they will become that way the more polishing they get. I did not polish these pipes, I would not want to put any thing on it you wouldn't want to smoke, I find that the oils from your hands and from use make them polished very quickly. I sprayed them with water to get them to be shinny for these photos. normally I walk around with one in my pocket and they shine up very fast just doing that. I have had a piece of black that had been with me for 7 years. It seems transparent, you can see deep into the stone, one of the many benefits of a stone pipe.

name: Stone Chillum
description:
A chillum is held in the fingers so that your hand becomes part of the pipe. this makes the users put their mouth on their own hands instead of the pipe.

they are 2.5" to 4.5" long. about 1.25" in diameter. they have a 5/8th" bowl that are about 3/4s" to 1" deep. I drill a 1/8th" at the bottom of the bowl, but I drill 1/4" up from the bottom to be more cooling.

name: Smoke stone
description:
For holding your home rolled cigarettes. some people find it is a nice way to celebrate smoking a cigarette in their house using a special holder. other people find it is helpful in the car not to drop the cigarette, and keep it from burning their fingers and mouth.
I personally use it to put out my cigarette when i go to the park and my dog takes off. I hate to be chasing him with a lit cigarette...
still others find it to be a convenient small (very small) pipe. it fits into the tiny pocket of your jeans nicely.
I included a quarter in the photos to show size. a quarter is 1". I make the hole in them at least 1/4" at the largest side so that any cigarette can fit and it tapers down to an 1/8th in so that it will hold any size cig. also the two sides are different sizes so that if you prefer to roll smaller sized cig's they will still fit comfortably.
I can also make smaller or larger ones. E mail me and tell me what you would like.

Also some have more then one color like the center of the first photo has a yellow purple pipe.

You may notice some of the other rocks are also translucent (Yellow is an awesome example). These are natural stone so they will become that way the more polishing they get. I sprayed them with water to get them to be shinny for these photos. normally I walk around with one in my pocket and they shine up very fast just doing that.
